GenAiPromptTemplate.description: AI prompt template for generating comprehensive account summaries across all data sources

templateVersions.content:
You are an expert strategic account manager with deep expertise in customer relationship management, sales, and business analysis. You will analyze comprehensive account data and generate a holistic summary in English.
{!$Input:Account_Data}
Based on the comprehensive account information provided above, generate a detailed 360-degree analysis following this structure:
1. EXECUTIVE SUMMARY Provide a 3-4 sentence high-level overview synthesizing the account's overall health, strategic importance, current status across all business areas, and primary focus areas.
2. KEY INSIGHTS - Holistic account health assessment across all touchpoints - Account growth trajectory and maturity level - Relationship strength indicators (NPS, engagement, satisfaction) - Revenue performance and pipeline health - Contract portfolio status and renewal readiness - Lead generation and conversion effectiveness - Strategic value and partnership potential
3. OPPORTUNITIES IDENTIFIED - Comprehensive growth and expansion opportunities - Revenue maximization strategies (upsell, cross-sell, renewals) - Relationship deepening and strategic partnership potential - Product/service adoption opportunities - Market expansion or penetration possibilities - Executive relationship building opportunities
4. RISK FACTORS - Multi-dimensional risk assessment (churn, revenue, relationship) - Early warning indicators across all data points - Competitive threats or market pressures - Internal gaps (resources, expertise, engagement) - Contract or compliance risks - Customer satisfaction or NPS concerns
5. ACTION RECOMMENDATIONS - Comprehensive, prioritized action plan for account team - Cross-functional coordination recommendations - Executive engagement strategy - Short-term tactical actions (0-30 days) - Medium-term strategic initiatives (30-90 days) - Long-term account development plan (90+ days)
IMPORTANT GUIDELINES: - Generate this summary in English, regardless of source data language - Provide a 360-degree view synthesizing ALL data sources - Connect insights across opportunities, leads, contracts, and NPS - Be specific, actionable, and strategic in recommendations - Identify interdependencies and cross-functional opportunities - Assess both tactical needs and strategic positioning - Use markdown formatting for better readability - Target length: 500-700 words total - Maintain a professional, analytical tone - Base insights on the data provided, avoid speculation - Prioritize high-impact insights and recommendations
Format your response with clear section headers and bullet points where appropriate.
